desc: mGetHdr strips the header out of a FITS file into an easily-edited ASCII file.

arguments.name: hdu
arguments.desc: Optional HDU offset for input file.

arguments.name: hdrfile
arguments.desc: ASCII header stripped from the input, with newlines added for readability.

arguments.name: htmlMode
arguments.desc: Output in HTML form (0: none, 1: full doc, 2:fragment).

return.name: ncard
return.desc: Number of lines in the header.
